## Project Stack
- Framework: Astro
- UI: Svelte
- CSS: Tailwind CSS
- Animation: GSAP
- Runtime: Bun

## Components Created
- Layout.astro: Base layout with Tailwind CSS import
- Counter.svelte: Interactive counter with GSAP animations
- AnimatedBox.svelte: GSAP rotating/scaling animation demo
- index.astro: Homepage showcasing all features
